sqls.sql: SELECT mo_no, mo_status, part_no, part_name, part_spec, part_idt, mrp_region_no, rmh_no, rmh_version, mo_qty, mo_hope_start_datetime, mo_hope_end_datetime, mo_lot_no, mo_desc, factory_no, workshop_no, mo_type, mo_priority, mo_priority2, mo_need_aps, mo_aps_direction, mo_cannot_earlier, mo_cannot_earlier_than, mo_reply_finish_time, client_no, client_name, mo_splited_from1, mo_splited_from2, mo_parent, mo_parent_top, mo_parent_all, unode_mo_parent, mo_cost_to, order_id1, order_type1, order_no1, order_type_name1, order_mrp_region_no1, order_id2, order_type2, order_no2, order_type_name2, order_mrp_region_no2, mo_rmk01, mo_rmk02, mo_rmk03, mo_rmk04, mo_rmk05, mo_rmk06, mo_rmk07, mo_rmk08, mo_rmk09, mo_rmk10, mo_rmk11, mo_rmk12, mo_rmk13, mo_rmk14, mo_rmk15, mo_rmk16, mo_rmk17, mo_rmk18, mo_rmk19, mo_rmk20, mo_bit1, mo_bit2, mo_bit3, mo_bit4, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host, mo_is_launch, mo_launch_time, mo_launch_user, mo_launch_host, mo_confirm_user, mo_confirm_host, mo_confirm_time, mo_sign_user, mo_sign_host, mo_sign_time, mo_pause_user, mo_pause_host, mo_pause_time, mo_close_user, mo_close_host, mo_close_time, order_qty1 FROM mo WHERE mo_id = @mo_id;
